summary: Completed testing of CMod mode feature for user Sian. Backend API correctly returns show_cmod_prompt flag, but frontend CMod prompt dialog is not displaying. CMod theme functionality works when manually enabled.

ui_bugs.issue: CMod prompt dialog not appearing despite backend returning show_cmod_prompt: true

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not displaying CMod prompt dialog when backend returns show_cmod_prompt: true
CModOverlay component with falling top hats not rendering when CMod mode is enabled

passed_tests: Backend API returns show_cmod_prompt: true for Sian login
CMod theme (lime green) applies correctly when manually enabled
CMod theme can be disabled and removed from DOM
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix CMod prompt dialog not appearing on Sian login despite backend returning show_cmod_prompt: true. Also fix CModOverlay component not rendering falling top hats animation when CMod mode is enabled.
